title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs - the ultimate solution for superior hearing protection at the shooting range!

Experience crystal-clear audio with our dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers, while our sound-activated compression reacts in 0.02 seconds to protect your ears from harmful noise. Plus, enjoy independent volume controls for a personalized listening experience.

Our earmuffs boast a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, thanks to our composite housing that dampens sound and provides superior protection. With 2 omnidirectional microphones, you'll enjoy clear communication with your shooting partners.

Connect your favorite audio device with our audio input jack and easily adjust volume with recessed control knobs. Powered by 2 AAA batteries (included), these earmuffs offer long-lasting protection.

Measuring 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing only 0.98 pounds, our earmuffs are lightweight and comfortable with a metal wire frame headband. Plus, they fold for easy storage and transport.

Get ready to experience a new level of hearing protection with the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Order yours today and never compromise on your hearing safety again!
